Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Bracer = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local leftBracer
local vCharacter
local damage = 20
local connection
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag:Remove() end end end
function blow(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Bracer or rightGrip.Part1 == Bracer) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function blow2(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then leftGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") if leftGrip and (leftGrip.Part0 == leftBracer or leftGrip.Part1 == leftBracer) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
wait(1.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") children = vCharacter:GetChildren() if leftArm then bracer = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Bracer") if bracer == nil then leftBracer = Bracer:Clone() leftBracer.Name = "Bracer" leftBracer.Parent = vCharacter
leftGrip = Instance.new("Weld") leftGrip.Parent = leftArm leftGrip.Part0 = leftArm leftGrip.Part1 = bracer leftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-0.2, 0, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) leftGrip.Name = "LeftGrip"
connection = leftBracer.Touched:connect(blow2) end end
for i = 1, #children do print("Found Children") if children[i].className == "CharacterMesh" and children[i].BodyPart == Enum.BodyPart.RightArm then Bracer.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.7, 0.8, 1.1) elseif children[i].className == "CharacterMesh" and children[i].BodyPart == Enum.BodyPart.LeftArm then leftBracer.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.7, 0.8, 1.1) end end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20.0 end end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then leftArm = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Left Arm") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if leftArm then leftGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") leftBracer = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Bracer") if leftGrip then leftGrip:Remove() end if leftBracer then leftBracer:Remove() end end end if connection then connection:disconnect() end if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
if Bracer then Bracer.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Bracer.Touched:connect(blow)
if leftBracer then leftBracer.Touched:connect(blow2) end

local Tool = script.Parent local Bracer = Tool.Handle
local dualAnim
local vCharacter
function onActivatedLocal() while Tool.Enabled == false do wait() end vCharacter = Tool.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
dualAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BracerBash) if dualAnim then dualAnim:Play() end end
function onEquippedLocal() end
function onUnequippedLocal() if dualAnim then dualAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
